Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration and the Committee on General Welfare

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration and the Committee on General Welfare
Oversight: The Impact of the Proposed “Public Charge” Rule on NYC.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight: The Impact of the Proposed “Public Charge” Rule on NYC.

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing the Speaker to submit a public comment on behalf of the Council to the Federal Register, concerning the proposed change to the Public Charge rule.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the Speaker to submit a public comment on behalf of the Council to the Federal Register, concerning the proposed change to the Public Charge rule.

Items.Title: Resolution opposing the newly proposed public charge rule and urging the federal government not to move forward with its adoption.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Opposing the newly proposed public charge rule and urging the federal government not to move forward with its adoption.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Speaker Johnson, Adams, Reynoso, Dromm, Menchaca, Levin, Miller, Yeger, Gibson, Torres, Grodenchik, Salamanca, Ayala, Gjonaj and Holden.
